fastFoodPlaces.name: Chipotle
fastFoodPlaces.description: Chipotle offers a variety of customizable burritos, bowls, and tacos made with fresh, high-quality ingredients.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Wendy's
fastFoodPlaces.description: Wendy's is known for its fresh, never frozen beef burgers, and their square-shaped patties are a signature feature.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Five Guys
fastFoodPlaces.description: Five Guys is famous for its juicy burgers, large portions of crispy fries, and customizable toppings.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Chick-fil-A
fastFoodPlaces.description: Chick-fil-A is renowned for its tender chicken sandwiches, crispy waffle fries, and exceptional customer service.

fastFoodPlaces.name: McDonald's
fastFoodPlaces.description: McDonald's delivers classic fast food, including their iconic Big Mac, fries, and the refreshing McFlurry.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Popeyes
fastFoodPlaces.description: Popeyes specializes in bold, flavorful Louisiana-style fried chicken, with perfectly seasoned biscuits and sides.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Taco Bell
fastFoodPlaces.description: Taco Bell serves up quick and tasty Mexican-inspired dishes, with a variety of tacos, burritos, and unique combos.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Subway
fastFoodPlaces.description: Subway allows you to create fresh sandwiches with a wide selection of meats, veggies, and sauces on freshly baked bread.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Arby's
fastFoodPlaces.description: Arby's is all about quality roast beef sandwiches, with signature curly fries and a variety of dipping sauces.

fastFoodPlaces.name: Burger King
fastFoodPlaces.description: Burger King is known for flame-grilled burgers, with the Whopper as its star offering, along with tasty sides and shakes.
